data.eml:eml: Checklist of Danish Grasshoppers and Crickets (Orthoptera)

Checklist of the species of Grasshoppers and Crickets (Orthoptera), accepted as Danish and included in www.allearter-databasen.dk. The list is part of a national checklist covering animals, plants, fungi etc. Compilation of the list started in 2009.Read more at www.allearter.dk - a project at DanBIF (Danish Biodiversity Information Facility - www.danbif.dk).
